channel.title: How do i make my self donator?
channel.description:
All i need is to make my self a donater on my server because there are some items that only donaters can use. Thanks
*Update* Nvm i found out how.

item.title: How do i make my self donator?
item.dc:creator: @unleashed_pvp unleashed pvp
item.description:
@unleashed_pvp wrote:

Go inti charictar files then click “who evers name” it should say Donar or Donator = 0 somthink like that change it to somthink like Donator =1 for example or some servers have that and Donaror points =0 change it to watever.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self donator?

item.title: How do i make my self donator?
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

If you have a source:

Go to your character folder.
find your account’s name.
than search for something called:

character-donator = 0

now change the 0 into something like 10 and that must be it. It worked for me.

Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self donator?
